Class dbAdmin

java.lang.Object
org.academics.dal.dbAdmin
public class dbAdmin extends Object
A database access class for managing admin actions.

  • Method Details

    • addSemesterTimeline

      public static void addSemesterTimeline(String year, String sem, String start_date, String end_date, String grade_submission_date, String grade_release_date, String course_float_start_date, String course_float_end_date, String course_add_drop_start_date, String course_add_drop_end_date) throws SQLException
      Adds a new semester timeline to the database.
      Parameters:
      year - the year of the semester
      sem - the semester
      start_date - the start date of the semester
      end_date - the end date of the semester
      grade_submission_date - the deadline for submitting grades
      grade_release_date - the date when grades are released to students
      course_float_start_date - the start date of the course floating period
      course_float_end_date - the end date of the course floating period
      course_add_drop_start_date - the start date of the course add/drop period
      course_add_drop_end_date - the end date of the course add/drop period
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL query

    • updateCourseCatalog

      public static boolean updateCourseCatalog(String courseCode, String courseName, double L, double T, double P, double S, double C, ArrayList<String> preRequisites) throws SQLException
      Updates the course catalog with the given information.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - the code of the course being updated
      courseName - the name of the course being updated
      L - the number of lecture hours per week
      T - the number of tutorial hours per week
      P - the number of practical hours per week
      S - the number of self-study hours per week
      C - the number of credits for the course
      preRequisites - a list of prerequisite course codes
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while executing the SQL query

    • getStudentCourses

      public static ResultSet getStudentCourses(String studentId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the courses enrolled by a student based on their student ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student for whom the course information is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The ResultSet containing the courses enrolled by the student.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while executing the SQL query.
